mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author, b.name as board FROM article a inner join member m on a.memberId = m.id inner join board b on a.boardId = b.id ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{startsFrom}, #{articlesPerPage}
SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author FROM article a inner join member m on a.memberId = m.id where a.boardId=#{boardId} ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{startsFrom}, #{articlesPerPage}
SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author, b.name as board FROM article AS a INNER JOIN `member` AS m on a.memberId = m.id inner join board b on a.boardId = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
